#summary Desirable Features of the runtime

= Introduction =
In this page, we will list and discuss the requriment of the runtime.

= Features =
== CAL Runtime Features ==
  * System initialization and query
  * Device management
  * Context management
  * Memory management
  * Program loading
  * Program execution
== Additional Features ==
  * Seperate compile-time behaviour and run-time behaviour using C++ template
  * Multi-devices support
  * Constant Buffer Pool
  * Event Management
